TheProcess1.para: We start with a short but informative call to discuss your project and get you pricing
We fabricate your product and schedule your installation
We expertly install your shade structure while noticing the details and keeping things clean

TheProcess2.para: We customize your estimate with all the features you want at the right price
We meet onsite to go over any jobsite-specific requirements and details
We do a post-install inspection to make sure everything is to your satisfaction.
